name: Lonely Fairy
description: This fairy's name is Wendy Wind. She belongs to the tribe of air fairies and was abandoned as a baby because she had no wings and therefore couldn't fly. Now she lives alone in the woods.

name: Robert Fire
description: This elf's name is Robert Fire. He belongs to the volcano elf tribe. He betrayed some of his tribe's leaders and was exiled. He realized his mistake and became good. He now lives in a desert near the city of Italia.
